name: Sloth Snooze
description:
Sloth Snooze is a fast-paced sidescroller featuring you (the sloth) and a variety of creatures. You must help the sloth reach its bed at the end of the level before time runs out. Hitting snails or spiders causes the sloth to fall down, either to the next branch or to the forest floor.  You can get extra time by collecting the coffee for an added caffeine boost.  You can also switch to sloth-time by pressing the space bar.

-Downloadable exe works better

-There are currently 3 levels

-Try playing without switching time scales (space bar) for more difficulty

-Made using Unity

-All art made in Pixly and using GIMP

-Music made at BeepBox.co, SFX from Freesound.org

-Submitted to Weekly Gam Jam 171 (Theme: Siesta)
